bibl.title: Asklepiades and Poseidippos.
bibl.note: Explores the relation between Asklepiades and Poseidippos, a link of professional proximity and friendship.

bibl.title: Land of Dreams. Greek and Latin Studies in Honour of A.H.M. Kessels

bibl.seg: A.P.M.H. LARDINOIS, M.G.M. VAN DER POEL and V.J.C. HUNINK (Edd.), Land of Dreams. Greek and Latin Studies in Honour of A.H.M. Kessels (Leiden, 2006) pp. 267-279.
Explores the relation between Asklepiades and Poseidippos, a link of professional proximity and friendship.
